entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
